document_data.name: Ponderous Tome
document_data.mainbody: A '''''Ponderous Tome''''' was a [[magic]] [[book]] that likely fell into the possession of several [[adventurer]]s in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: This thick book had a cover made from some brown material. It was decorated with golden yellow symbols and clasps. It had a yellow [[gem]] on its spine.
document_data.Powers: Using the item made a chosen person think deep, remorseful thoughts. This could be used to distract opponents and interrupt their attacks. However, this ability had varying recovery periods before it could be used again.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''Ponderous Tomes'' could be found in [[Neverwinter]], [[Gauntlgrym]], [[Mount Hotenow]], and [[Neverwinter Wood]]. They were also available for purchase at shops in those locations. Such books were likely found by the adventurers that stopped [[Deathsleep]], the [[green dragon]].
